headline: Steel Dynamics Honored with 2024 Sustainability Partner Award from Union Pacific
summary: Steel Dynamics, Inc. (NASDAQ/GS: STLD) announced today that Union Pacific recognized Steel Dynamics with a Sustainability Partner Award. Union Pacific honored innovative partners that demonstrated leadership and progress toward achieving their sustainability goals at their annual Sustainability Partner Award Ceremony.
